lift_hill.title: Lift Hill
lift_hill.description: An inclined track meant to give the trains potential energy

launch_straight.title: Launch Track
launch_straight.description: A section of track meant to accelerate the trains through external input

brake_run.title: Brake Run
brake_run.description: A section of track meant to slow or stop trains

station.title: Station
station.description: A section of track where a train stops to board and unboard passengers

moving.title: Moving
moving.description: Any type of moving track, like switch tracks

waiting.title: Waiting
waiting.description: Tracks used to hold trains if the next block section is occupied

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Tracks meant to hold spare trains or conduct maintenance
